{{stub}}{{film infobox | image= | name=The Legend of Gurthang | director=Jared Belt | producer=Jared Belt | writer=Jared Belt | narrator= | starring=Tyler Voss, Chris Sapp, Jared Belt, Duran Smith | music=Austin Wippich | cinematography=Ryan Printz | editing=Jared Belt | studio=Jared Belt Films | distributor=Jared Belt Films | released= | runtime=12 minutes | country= | language=[[Modern English|English]] | budget= | website=[https://www.jaredbeltfilms.com/the-legend-of-gurthang.html Official website] | imdb_id= }} '''''The Legend of Gurthang''''' is a [[:Category:Fan films|fan film]] directed, written, and produced by Jared Belt. It was released online. ==Plot== From the official website:
​"The Legend of Gurthang" is an original story set in [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien's]] Middle Earth, inspired by and loosely based on [[The Children of Hurin]], by J.R.R. Tolkien and [[Christopher Tolkien]]. Set in the [[Second Age]] at the height of the [[War of the Last Alliance]], this story follows a man from the kingdom of [[Arnor]], on his lone mission to the far island of [[Tol Morwen]], to find and retrieve [[Gurthang]], a legendary sword of great power once owned by Turin, son of Hurin.
